channel.title: Use cases on Butler
channel.description: Recent content in Use cases on Butler

item.title: Retired use cases
item.description: Some features age with grace, others don’t. Here’s a list of features that are candidates for removal from Butler, or that have already been removed. Candidates for removal in coming versions Real-time metrics around active users While a good idea in theory, Butler just wasn’t the vehicle for this. The way Butler approached this was to have Sense’s log4net logging framework send UDP messages to Butler when users logged in/out or sessions started/ended.
